### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15071](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15071.html) (Docs: add gmake syntax to autoconf script b

> As of FreeBSD 12.0, an ancient GDB is [no longer installed by default](https://www.freebsd.org/releases/12.0R/relnotes.html). 

Oh that's good to know!

> Instead, a modern version is available from [`devel/gdb`](https://www.freshports.org/devel/gdb), which is currently version 8.2.x. A recent `LLDB` is also available.

Yes, a newer, usable one was always available from ports. It's g
Will test this later, after I've updated my FreeBSD box, but changes look good to me, utACK 901baf2c9ef31e68137d5bd8eb5a2b689a71f818
